name: Firebrand Archer
text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Firebrand Archer deals 1 damage to each opponent.

rulings.text: Firebrand Archer’s ability will resolve before the spell that caused it to trigger. The ability will resolve even if that spell is countered.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, Firebrand Archer’s ability causes it to deal a total of 2 damage to the opposing team.
